Player History
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 4/3/1986 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 9/2/1987 with a Torn Hip Muscle, out for 2 weeks...
Traded from Chicago to Los Angeles on 4/11/1988 (Going to LAD: P Dave Pavlas, C Damon Berryhill, LF Lou Frazier, RF Dave Martinez. Going to CHC: 2B Julio Franco, RF Dave Parker)...
Traded from Los Angeles to Montreal on 6/10/1989 (Going to LAD: P Mark Davis, P Manny Hernandez, P Roy Smith. Going to MON: LF Keith Mitchell, RF Lou Frazier)...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/30/1990, off Jeff Reardon (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/24/1990, off Chuck Finley (CHC)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/16/1990, off Doug Drabek (SD)...
